ethical_question: A doctor has a patient dying of a painful condition that leaves them no dignity and they will die in 24 hours. Three patients couold be saved if the doctor allows the patient to die peacfully tonight but they would have to remove life support. What should the doctor do?

tag_descriptions.Patient Autonomy: Patient's right to self-determination in healthcare decisions.
tag_descriptions.End-Of-Life Care: Ethical considerations surrounding care for terminally ill patients.
tag_descriptions.Dignity: Respect for inherent worth and autonomy of all individuals.
tag_descriptions.Beneficence: Acting to promote well-being and prevent harm.
tag_descriptions.Quality Of Life: Enhancing or preserving an individual's well-being and happiness.
